Room.Name: The Great Gates
Room.ShortDescription: You are at the southern end of the hallway inside the Dragon's Citadel.
Room.LongDescription: Two massive iron gates stand in front of you, one to the east and one to the west. To the north, a large plaque is inscripted with the following message: "Only the Worthy and Pure of Heart may Enter the Citadel of the Dragons or be Forever Destroyed." On the east gate, you can see a white plaque with black writing that you can't read. On the west gate is a similar plaque, except it is black with white writing. The gates appear to be locked. The locks glow in a greenish hue and do not appear to be unlockable with an "ordinary" key.
